login.title: Welcome to HealthUp
login.subtitle: Sign in to securely view and understand your lab results

errors.emailUnverified: Your Google email is not verified. Please verify your email and try again.
errors.rateLimitExceeded: Too many sign-in attempts. Please wait a minute and try again.
errors.serviceUnavailable: Google authentication is temporarily unavailable. Please try again later.
errors.networkError: Network error. Please check your connection and try again.
errors.notConfigured: Google Sign-In is not configured. Please contact support.
errors.loadFailed: Failed to load sign-in. Please refresh the page.

welcome.title: Your labs, explained.
welcome.subtitle: Upload a lab report to see what really matters — explained clearly.
welcome.dropHint: Drop a file here or click to browse
welcome.description: Upload your lab reports and get AI-powered insights about your health.

processing.preparingSummary: Preparing a clear summary for you...

upload.title: Upload Your First Lab Report
upload.description: Start by uploading a lab report (PDF or image)

processing.title: Analyzing Your Report
processing.description: We're extracting and analyzing your lab data...

insight.title: Your Health Insight
insight.description: Here's what we found in your report

complete.title: You're All Set!
complete.description: Your lab data is ready. Ask questions about your health.

insight.error: Could not generate insight. Please try again.

fallback.en: Your lab report has been successfully processed. You can now ask questions about your results.
fallback.ru: Ваш анализ был успешно обработан. Теперь вы можете задавать вопросы о ваших результатах.

errors.uploadFailed: Failed to upload report. Please try again.
errors.processingFailed: Failed to process report. Please try a different file.
